**Doctoral Dissertation Research Fellowship**, University of Minnesota Graduate School  \hfill 2022-2023  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $35,000. "Predicting biological invasions using remote sensing and artificial intelligence"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Competitive internal fellowship, stipend, and tuition for "most accomplsihed PhD candidates".  

**Climate Innovation Challenge**, Google \hfill 2022-2023  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; "Remote sensing biological invasions using high resolution imagery and deep learning"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $13,500 equivalent in Google Cloud research credits.  

**Hatch Grant**, USDA National Institute of Food and Agriculture (PI: D. Moeller) \hfill 2021-2023  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; "Remote sensing biological invasions: Using satellite imagery to detect and monitor  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; leafy spurge population dynamics across the Northern Great Plains"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Contributed to grant writing and submission, awarded $65,000 for research.  

**Bill Dahl Graduate Student Research Award**, Botanical Society of America \hfill 2020-2021  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $1,500. "Does adaptation facilitate or impede future plant invasions"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Award to support PhD field research in adaptation and climate change study.  

**Bell Museum Dayton Natural History Award**, University of Minnesota \hfill 2020-2021  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $2,500. "Does adaptive genetic differentiation facilitate or impede future plant invasions"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Award supporting PhD field research and conference travel.  

**Earth Observation Grant**, European Space Agency \hfill 2020-2021  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; "Population monitoring of invasive species using satellite imagery"  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $12,000 equivalent in access to high resolution satellite imagery.  

**Accelerated Data Science Grant**, NVIDIA \hfill 2019-2020  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $1,000. Gifted graphics processing unit (GPU) to accelerate deep learning model development.  

**Grants-in-Aid**, University of Minnesota \hfill 2019-2022  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $2,000 total. Four small internal grants supporting field research and travel.  

**Conference Travel Awards**, University of Minnesota \hfill 2018-2022  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $3,000 total. Three awards for domestic and international conference travel.  

**Undergraduate Research Opportunity Program**, University of Minnesota \hfill 2016-2017  
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; $3,600. Pilot award for independent research in plant breeding and cytogenetics.
